org.jpac.plc

Class Connection

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jpac.plc.Connection

  • public abstract class Connection
extends java.lang.Object
    represents a TCP/IP connection to a plc or to a i/o device.

      an instance of Connection is created and the connection to given device is initiated immediately

          int port,
          boolean debug)
           throws java.io.IOException
        an instance of Connection is created and the connection to given device is initiated immediately
        Parameters:
        host - ip address of the device (e.g. 192.168.0.1)
        debug - switch on/off generation of debug information

        java.io.IOException
